pkgmetadata.longdescription: This sphinx extension provides some useful extensions to the Sphinxs autodoc extension. Those are It creates a Table of Contents in the style of the autosummary extension with methods, classes, functions and attributes As you can include the __init__ method documentation for via the autoclass_content configuration value, we provide the autodata_content configuration value to include the documentation from the __call__ method You can exclude the string representation of specific objects. E.g. if you have a large dictionary using the not_document_data configuration value.
